3355.verse: فَأَنجَيْنَـٰهُ|But We saved him|139|159|6501$وَأَصْحَـٰبَ|and (the) people|131|172|12774$ٱلسَّفِينَةِ|(of) the ship,|108|148|10916$وَجَعَلْنَـٰهَآ|and We made it|124|164|11911$ءَايَةً|a Sign|61|81|2339$لِّلْعَـٰلَمِينَ|for the worlds.|117|117|3107$

3357.verse: إِنَّمَا|Only|55|66|102$تَعْبُدُونَ|you worship|99|122|1216$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|124|224$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|76|2$أَوْثَـٰنًا|idols,|71|94|13594$وَتَخْلُقُونَ|and you create|121|144|13595$إِفْكًا‌ۚ|falsehood.|88|99|13596$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|81|58$ٱلَّذِينَ|those whom|100|122|20$تَعْبُدُونَ|you worship|99|122|1216$مِن دُونِ|besides|101|124|224$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|76|2$لَا|(do) not|75|98|30$يَمْلِكُونَ|possess|92|103|9394$لَكُمْ|for you|67|78|207$رِزْقًا|provision.|83|105|206$فَٱبْتَغُواْ|So seek any|101|123|13597$عِندَ|from|56|78|521$ٱللَّهِ|Allah|53|75|606$ٱلرِّزْقَ|the provision|105|127|9444$وَٱعْبُدُوهُ|and worship Him|127|138|13598$وَٱشْكُرُواْ|and be grateful|121|165|1350$لَهُۥٓ‌ۖ|to Him.|67|156|977$إِلَيْهِ|To Him|65|154|296$تُرْجَعُونَ|you will be returned.|156|200|297$

3358.verse: وَإِن|And if|58|70|213$تُكَذِّبُواْ|you deny|81|104|13599$فَقَدْ|then verily,|95|118|1016$كَذَّبَ|denied|67|90|5487$أُمَمٌ|(the) nations|107|130|5564$مِّن قَبْلِكُمْ‌ۖ|before you.|107|130|192$وَمَا|And not|72|84|46$عَلَى|(is) on|63|91|52$ٱلرَّسُولِ|the Messenger|117|173|4120$إِلَّا|except|65|121|86$ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ|the conveyance|127|183|2713$ٱلْمُبِينُ|clear."|80|108|5465$

3361.verse: يُعَذِّبُ|He punishes|99|110|4960$مَن|whom|58|79|76$يَشَآءُ|He wills|69|90|867$وَيَرْحَمُ|and has mercy|117|138|13604$مَن|(on) whom|91|112|76$يَشَآءُ‌ۖ|He wills,|74|95|867$وَإِلَيْهِ|and to Him|91|102|2165$تُقْلَبُونَ|you will be returned.|156|156|13605$

3363.verse: وَٱلَّذِينَ|And those who|119|133|42$كَفَرُواْ|disbelieve|84|112|59$بِـَٔـايَـٰتِ|in (the) Signs|110|138|609$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah|81|109|2$وَلِقَآئِهِۦٓ|and (the) meeting (with) Him,|218|232|11048$أُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|those|82|102|51$يَئِسُواْ|(have) despaired|132|171|13606$مِن|of|50|89|53$رَّحْمَتِى|My Mercy.|93|132|13607$وَأُوْلَـٰٓئِكَ|And those,|96|135|55$لَهُمْ|for them|76|96|98$عَذَابٌ|(is) a punishment|135|371|72$أَلِيمٌ|painful.|68|304|93$

3355.verse: But We saved him and the companions of the ship, and We made it a sign for the worlds.

3356.verse: And [We sent] Abraham, when he said to his people, "Worship Allah and fear Him. That is best for you, if you should know.

3357.verse: You only worship, besides Allah, idols, and you produce a falsehood. Indeed, those you worship besides Allah do not possess for you [the power of] provision. So seek from Allah provision and worship Him and be grateful to Him. To Him you will be returned."

3358.verse: And if you [people] deny [the message] - already nations before you have denied. And there is not upon the Messenger except [the duty of] clear notification.

3359.verse: Have they not considered how Allah begins creation and then repeats it? Indeed that, for Allah, is easy.

3360.verse: Say, [O Muhammad], "Travel through the land and observe how He began creation. Then Allah will produce the final creation. Indeed Allah, over all things, is competent."

3361.verse: He punishes whom He wills and has mercy upon whom He wills, and to Him you will be returned.

3362.verse: And you will not cause failure [to Allah] upon the earth or in the heaven. And you have not other than Allah any protector or any helper.

3363.verse: And the ones who disbelieve in the signs of Allah and the meeting with Him - those have despaired of My mercy, and they will have a painful punishment.
